verses.roman:
purī kahe,-tomā-saṅge rahite vāñchā kari'
gauḍa haite cali' āilāṅa nīlācala-purī

synonyms: purī kahe—Paramānanda Purī replied; tomā-saṅge—with You; rahite—to stay; vāñchā kari'—desiring; gauḍa haite—from Bengal; cali'—traveling; āilāṅa—I have come; nīlācala-purī—to Jagannātha Purī.
translation: Paramānanda Purī replied, "I also wish to stay with You. Therefore I have come from Bengal, Gauḍa, to Jagannātha Purī.
